item.description: It was this fellow: http://www.joshashton.com/ and this one http://portfolio.tofslie.com/#1843140/Sage-Fly-Fishing (found them by happy accident). Great body of work these two have!
item.content:encoded: It was this fellow: http://www.joshashton.com/ and this one http://portfolio.tofslie.com/#1843140/Sage-Fly-Fishing (found them by happy accident). Great body of work these two have!

item.title: By: Heath Waller

item.description: I'd really love to know who designed this amazing site. Just love everything about it!
